ivardefs.name: attestation
ivardefs.desc: Information about the entity attesting to information.

ivardefs.name: failureAction
ivardefs.desc: The result if validation fails (fatal; warning; record only; none).

ivardefs.name: lastPerformed
ivardefs.desc: The date/time validation was last completed (including failed validations).

ivardefs.name: need
ivardefs.desc: The frequency with which the target must be validated (none; initial; periodic).

ivardefs.name: nextScheduled
ivardefs.desc: The date when target is next validated, if appropriate.

ivardefs.name: primarySource_
ivardefs.desc: Information about the primary source(s) involved in validation.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The validation status of the target (attested; validated; in process; requires revalidation; validation failed; revalidation failed).

ivardefs.name: statusDate
ivardefs.desc: When the validation status was updated.

ivardefs.name: targetLocation_
ivardefs.desc: The fhirpath location(s) within the resource that was validated.

ivardefs.name: validationProcess_
ivardefs.desc: The primary process by which the target is validated (edit check; value set; primary source; multiple sources; standalone; in context).

ivardefs.name: validationType
ivardefs.desc: What the target is validated against (nothing; primary source; multiple sources).

ivardefs.name: validator_
ivardefs.desc: Information about the entity validating information.

properties.desc: Describes validation requirements, source(s), status and dates for one or more elements.
